description: Forget disposables, carry this kit with you on picnics or when getting take-out. All parts are made with bioplastics made of corn or sugarcane.Fibre-based materials are safe in microwaves and dishwashers.Straw is durable sugarcane- and wood fibre-based HDPE.Collapsible cup is bio-HDPE and a sugarcane-based TPE.Cup has graduations for measuring.Corn-based co-polyester spork has a serrated edge to do duty as a spoon, fork and knife.
name: Light My Fire ReKit BIO-Plastic
